Package org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ReaderPlugin
    Card readers plugin interface.
    ReaderPoolPlugin
    The ReaderPoolPlugin interface provides methods to handle the access to an undefined number of SeReader resources.
    SeReader
    SeReader interface To retrieve the unique reader name To check the SE presence. To set the communication protocol and the specific reader parameters. Interface used by applications processing SE.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPluginFactory  
    AbstractSeProxyComponent
    This abstract class mutualizes the management of the name and part of the configuration of SeProxy components (plugins and readers)
    SeProxyService
    The Class SeProxyService.
    SeSelector
    The SeSelector class groups the information and methods used to select a particular secure element
    SeSelector.AidSelector
    Static nested class to hold the data elements used to perform an AID based selection
    SeSelector.AidSelector.IsoAid  
    SeSelector.AtrFilter
    Static nested class to hold the data elements used to perform an ATR based filtering
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ChannelControl
    indicates the action to be operated on the physical channel at the end of the request transmission.
    MultiSeRequestProcessing
    indicates whether the selection process should stop after the first matching or process all requests in the SeRequest Set
    SeSelector.AidSelector.FileControlInformation
    FileOccurrence indicates how to which template is expected in accordance with ISO7816-4
    SeSelector.AidSelector.FileOccurrence
    FileOccurrence indicates how to carry out the file occurrence in accordance with ISO7816-4
